parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

beneficiaryNickNames.description: The nick name of the beneficiary

beneficiaryNickName.description: The nick name of the beneficiary

paymentDetails.description: Identifies the Payment Details to enable the Beneficiary to apply the payment.

paymentDetail.description: Identifies the Payment Details to enable the Beneficiary to apply the payment.

overrides.description: Records the override messages generated during processing of an activity.

override.description: Records the override messages generated during processing of an activity.

beneficiaryCustomerId.description: The customer identifier where the beneficiary is a customer of the bank

beneficiaryAccountId.description: The identifier of the beneficiary account

bankSortCode.description: Defines the bank sorting code of the bank and branch. The code entered must exist as a sort code. 6 numeric characters.

customerReference.description: The reference quoted by customer of the ordering account in a payment that is to be communicated to the beneficiary when a payment takes place

beneficiaryBIC.description: BIC (Bank Identifier Code) of the beneficiary customer

beneficiaryIBAN.description: The IBAN of the beneficiary's account

preferredPaymentAmount.description: The payment amount to be populated in the FT (Fund Transfer) or Payment Order when the Beneficiary will be used is displayed in this field

preferredPaymentProduct.description: The preferred payment order product which allows payment through the beneficiary

accountWithBank.description: Identifies the bank where the beneficiary maintains his account.

paymentCurrencyId.description: The identifier of the payment currency

beneficiaryOurCharges.description: Determines who will be responsible for charges.

paymentCountry.description: The country to which a payment is sent, usually where the beneficiary resides

recordStatus.description: The status of the record processed

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS
